channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Van door dumped in car park back of Dodd house, 10th December
item.description:
A van door has been dumped at the rear of Dodd house in the car park. It’s located in a bay against the wall close to the sports pitch. The door has been there for 4/5 days.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rossetti Road, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Close to Waterhouse, 10th December
item.description:
Report of an ongoing issue regarding tree branches and leaf fall over the laundry roof at the sheltered housing scheme in Waterhouse Close. The roof continues to suffer from water ingress, and it is believed that the accumulation of leaves and debris is contributing to the problem. It was initially thought that the tree in question was located within the grounds of one of two nearby schools. However, as shown in the attached correspondence, neither school has accepted responsibility for it. Could you please advise on how we should proceed from here? We would welcome an assessment of the tree’s location and any appropriate action that can be taken to prevent further damage to the roof and disruption to residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Lyndhurst Gardens, Belsize Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Remove bin, 10th December
item.description:
The street bin in this location has been brought back recently and the area surrounding the bin is always overflowing with rubbish, litter and dirt. the surrounding residents and those who use the pavement have to avoid it due to the overflowing rubbish and smell. kindly remove the bin from this location as it is unsightly, smells and visually upsetting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Upland Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped Fridge Freezer & 5 Black bin bags, 10th December
item.description:
Someone has pulled up into a disabled bay on Alnwick Road in the night and dumped a fridge freezer and black bin bags on the pavement. This is an ongoing issue with waste regularly being dumped at this location and it needs to be dealt with by the council

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mottingham Lane, Mottingham
Report on FixMyStreet
